name: components/Background.js
components/CustomCursor.js
components/Loader.js
components/MobileMotion.js
components/NavigationController.js
NavigationController
description:
"smart" navigation which goes off screen when scrolling down for a better overview of content and UX
navigation appears when scrolling up

name: scrolling
description: flag, state variable for scrolling event

name: scrollNavigationOffset
description: amount of pixels to scroll from top for adding "has-scrolled" state class

name: previousTop
description: variable for storing amount of scroll from top position value

name: currentTop
description: variable for storing current scroll position value

content:
# Altered8 — web

#### Build system

- [Gulp](https://gulpjs.com/) 4 used
- [browsersync](https://browsersync.io/) for live reload

#### (S)CSS

- based on **ITCSS** architecture (read about it [here](https://www.xfive.co/blog/itcss-scalable-maintainable-css-architecture/)) and inspired by [inuitcss framework](https://github.com/inuitcss/inuitcss)
- sassbox (scss functions/mixins module)is installed by default, but it's not imported in main style.scss file. For docs and installation, [read this](https://github.com/degordian/sassbox).
- uses postcss by default - autoprefixer will automatically add vendor prefixes by [browserslist ruleset defined inside package.json](https://github.com/postcss/autoprefixer#browsers)

#### Scripts

```bash
npm run dev - dev environent with browsersync
npm run build - build production
npm run build:analyze - builds production creates an informational page about your js bundles
```

## License

MIT
name: ./README.md

{
    "name": "gulp4-boilerplate",
    "version": "0.1.0",
    "description": "Altered 8 frontend project template based on gulp, es6 and scss",
    "author": "Altered 8",
    "email": "info@altrd8.com",
    "private": true,
    "engines": {
        "node": ">=12.16.1",
        "npm": ">=6.14.2"
    },
    "scripts": {
        "build": "gulp build",
        "dev": "gulp",
        "esdoc": "./node_modules/.bin/esdoc",
        "format": "prettier --write \"static/**/*.{scss,js}\"",
        "lint:scss": "stylelint 'static/**/*.scss'"
    },
    "repository": {
        "type": "git",
        "url": ""
    },
    "browserslist": [
        "> 0.5%",
        "last 2 versions"
    ],
    "devDependencies": {
        "@babel/core": "^7.8.7",
        "@babel/plugin-proposal-class-properties": "^7.8.3",
        "@babel/plugin-proposal-object-rest-spread": "^7.8.3",
        "@babel/plugin-syntax-dynamic-import": "^7.8.3",
        "@babel/preset-env": "^7.8.7",
        "@babel/register": "^7.8.6",
        "@namics/stylelint-bem": "^6.3.0",
        "babelify": "^10.0.0",
        "browser-sync": "^2.26.7",
        "browserify": "^16.5.0",
        "del": "^5.1.0",
        "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
        "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
        "eslint": "^6.8.0",
        "eslint-config-prettier": "^6.10.0",
        "eslint-plugin-prettier": "^3.1.2",
        "esm": "^3.2.25",
        "gulp": "^4.0.2",
        "gulp-autoprefixer": "^7.0.1",
        "gulp-babel": "^8.0.0",
        "gulp-clean-css": "^4.2.0",
        "gulp-concat": "^2.6.1",
        "gulp-rename": "^2.0.0",
        "gulp-sass": "^4.0.2",
        "gulp-sourcemaps": "^2.6.5",
        "gulp-uglify": "^3.0.2",
        "prettier": "^1.19.1",
        "stylelint": "^13.2.1",
        "stylelint-config-prettier": "^8.0.1",
        "stylelint-prettier": "^1.1.2",
        "stylelint-scss": "^3.15.0",
        "vinyl-buffer": "^1.0.1",
        "vinyl-source-stream": "^2.0.0"
    },
    "dependencies": {
        "gsap": "^3.2.4",
        "mailgo": "^0.8.5",
        "pixi.js": "^5.2.1",
        "poly-fluid-sizing": "^1.1.0"
    }
}
